name: Meet the Kittens of the Cattery
description: What's better than one kitten? How about a room full of kittens! Come take a peek inside the cattery to see what our fuzzy feline friends are up to in this week's Pet of the Week.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: What’s better than one kitten? How about a room full of kittens! Come take a peek inside the cattery to see what our fuzzy feline friends are up to in this week’s Pet of the Week. If you’re interested in adopting one of our many kittens at the Bonita or Carlsbad shelters, please visit www.SDDAC.com.
